title: The 26 Best Deals From Nordstrom’s Half-Yearly Sale
description: Fashion editors never miss this one—the deals are that good.
excerpt: We found Reformation, Damson Madder, JW Anderson, and Skims for up to 40 percent off at the Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale. Shop the best deals here.
text: Rothy’s The Summer SandalThese machine-washable Rothy’s sandals make the ultimate pool slides—though you’ll quickly find yourself wearing them in many other places than that. Tom Ford Vanilla Sex Eau de ParfumYes, Tom Ford’s scent smells as alluring as its name suggests. In addition to vanilla, it features notes of sandalwood and almond for a hint of sweetness and nuttiness that make it hard to resist. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowReformation Anna Rugby Crop Knit TopLean into this season’s preppy, nautical aesthetic with this striped Reformation rugby shirt that pairs effortlessly with denim cutoffs. Veronica Beard Annette Slide SandalThe perfect suede sandal does exist—and it’s on sale. This versatile style is bound to sell out, so don’t leave it lingering in your cart for long.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowDamson Madder Mia Tie Neck Strapless Midi DressThe drapey bow on this Damson Madder dress can also be worn criss-crossed around your neck, so you’ll never get bored of wearing it. JW Anderson The Corner Leather ToteReady to invest in a new work bag? This timeless JW Anderson tote is worth the splurge.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFavorite Daughter The Diana JacketA refreshing take on a classic, this Favorite Daughter blazer is a work wardrobe essential you’ll get countless wears out of. The collarless silhouette is a playground for summery statement necklaces. Bobbi Brown Crushed Lip Color Moisturizing LipstickThe hydrating formula of this Bobbi Brown lipstick revives dry lips while leaving behind a gentle wash of color. A plethora of nude shades are currently discounted.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRag & Bone Flexi Sofie Wide Leg JeansThese high-rise, wide-leg Rag & Bone jeans are cut from super soft, stretchy denim that you’ll want to wear day in and day out. Good thing the silhouette pairs equally well with tanks and sandals as it does with sweaters and boots. Chloé Small Marcie Leather Crossbody BagThis keep-forever Chloé bag is 40 percent off at the moment. Need we say more?Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowVince Melina Fisherman SandalMinimalist fisherman sandals are a key footwear trend for summer 2025, so you might as well snag this nearly-perfect pair from Vince while you still can. Theory Cotton Oversized Double-Breasted Trench CoatThis chic Theory trench will carry you through the last few days of spring—and it’ll be there waiting for you when temperatures dip in early fall.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSkims Stretch Cotton Jersey BodysuitSkims fans, now’s the time to stock up on basics. Dozens of the brand’s foundational pieces are currently on sale, including this simple white bodysuit.Havaianas You Spikes Flip FlopIt’s time to snag yourself a pair of Gigi Hadid’s go-to flip-flops now that pool season is in full swing.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSt. Moran Freshwater Pearl Pendant Curb Chain NecklaceA single, dainty freshwater pearl brings a summery touch to this layerable St. Moran chain. It’s the easiest graduation gift you’ll ever find, too. Hoka Clifton 9 Running ShoeTreat your feet to these comfortable Clifton 9 running shoes. Supportive enough for runs and hot girl walks, they’re also stylish enough for travel and casual wear. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowZella Studio Luxe Pocket Bike ShortsThese chocolate brown bike shorts come equipped with flattering curved seams and practical phone-sized pockets on the sides. Fila x Hailey Stretch Cotton Rib Baby TeeAll the It girls are wearing butter yellow this year. Take the trending color for a test drive with this versatile baby tee from Hailey Bieber’s Fila collab. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLe Specs Mermaiden 52mm Rectangular SunglassesAt 70 percent off, these sleek Le Specs sunglasses practically add themselves to your cart. Madewell Drawstring Waist Low Slung Baggy JeansWith Memorial Day behind us, it’s officially time to don white jeans. This editor-loved silhouette from Madewell offers a modern take on the summer classic.
html:
Rothy’s The Summer Sandal

These machine-washable Rothy’s sandals make the ultimate pool slides—though you’ll quickly find yourself wearing them in many other places than that.

Tom Ford Vanilla Sex Eau de Parfum

Yes, Tom Ford’s scent smells as alluring as its name suggests. In addition to vanilla, it features notes of sandalwood and almond for a hint of sweetness and nuttiness that make it hard to resist.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Reformation Anna Rugby Crop Knit Top

Lean into this season’s preppy, nautical aesthetic with this striped Reformation rugby shirt that pairs effortlessly with denim cutoffs.

Veronica Beard Annette Slide Sandal

The perfect suede sandal does exist—and it’s on sale. This versatile style is bound to sell out, so don’t leave it lingering in your cart for long.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Damson Madder Mia Tie Neck Strapless Midi Dress

The drapey bow on this Damson Madder dress can also be worn criss-crossed around your neck, so you’ll never get bored of wearing it.

JW Anderson The Corner Leather Tote

Ready to invest in a new work bag? This timeless JW Anderson tote is worth the splurge.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Favorite Daughter The Diana Jacket

A refreshing take on a classic, this Favorite Daughter blazer is a work wardrobe essential you’ll get countless wears out of. The collarless silhouette is a playground for summery statement necklaces.

Bobbi Brown Crushed Lip Color Moisturizing Lipstick

The hydrating formula of this Bobbi Brown lipstick revives dry lips while leaving behind a gentle wash of color. A plethora of nude shades are currently discounted.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Rag & Bone Flexi Sofie Wide Leg Jeans

These high-rise, wide-leg Rag & Bone jeans are cut from super soft, stretchy denim that you’ll want to wear day in and day out. Good thing the silhouette pairs equally well with tanks and sandals as it does with sweaters and boots.

Chloé Small Marcie Leather Crossbody Bag

This keep-forever Chloé bag is 40 percent off at the moment. Need we say more?

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Vince Melina Fisherman Sandal

Minimalist fisherman sandals are a key footwear trend for summer 2025, so you might as well snag this nearly-perfect pair from Vince while you still can.

Theory Cotton Oversized Double-Breasted Trench Coat

This chic Theory trench will carry you through the last few days of spring—and it’ll be there waiting for you when temperatures dip in early fall.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Skims Stretch Cotton Jersey Bodysuit

Skims fans, now’s the time to stock up on basics. Dozens of the brand’s foundational pieces are currently on sale, including this simple white bodysuit.

Havaianas You Spikes Flip Flop

It’s time to snag yourself a pair of Gigi Hadid’s go-to flip-flops now that pool season is in full swing.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

St. Moran Freshwater Pearl Pendant Curb Chain Necklace

A single, dainty freshwater pearl brings a summery touch to this layerable St. Moran chain. It’s the easiest graduation gift you’ll ever find, too.

Hoka Clifton 9 Running Shoe

Treat your feet to these comfortable Clifton 9 running shoes. Supportive enough for runs and hot girl walks, they’re also stylish enough for travel and casual wear.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Zella Studio Luxe Pocket Bike Shorts

These chocolate brown bike shorts come equipped with flattering curved seams and practical phone-sized pockets on the sides.

Fila x Hailey Stretch Cotton Rib Baby Tee

All the It girls are wearing butter yellow this year. Take the trending color for a test drive with this versatile baby tee from Hailey Bieber’s Fila collab.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Le Specs Mermaiden 52mm Rectangular Sunglasses

At 70 percent off, these sleek Le Specs sunglasses practically add themselves to your cart.

Madewell Drawstring Waist Low Slung Baggy Jeans

With Memorial Day behind us, it’s officially time to don white jeans. This editor-loved silhouette from Madewell offers a modern take on the summer classic.
